trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource" /> types to UI Automation.
<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> is used as a peer for <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> when it contains the following tree:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> est utilisé en tant qu’homologue de <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> lorsqu’il contient l’arborescence suivante :

trans-unit.source: ![HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects](~/add/media/apgenericroot.png "HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects")

Because only <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types have peers, and visuals are not <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types, a common parent does not exist in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: Étant donné qu’uniquement <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types ont des homologues et des éléments visuels ne sont pas <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types, un parent commun n’existe pas dans le [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] arborescence pour le <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] expects a single root peer from the application; therefore, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] creates a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> in order to serve as a single root peer to parent peers for the two <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] attend un homologue racine unique de l’application ; Par conséquent, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] crée un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer> pour le <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> afin de servir un homologue racine unique des homologues parents pour les deux <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the root peer is a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: En général, l’homologue racine est un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" /> class.
Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Pane" /> enumeration value.

Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
The bounding rectangle.
Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
A string that contains "Pane".
Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
The string that contains the label.
You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez considérer la propriété name comme s’il s’agissait d’une chaîne de texte utilisée par les utilisateurs pour décrire le contrôle à qu'auquel ils font référence.

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Assurez-vous que vous disposez d’une représentation textuelle pour tous les contrôles dans le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] afin que peuvent faire référence au contrôle par programmation de manière localisée.
